name: Occator
description:
• PLOT

A group of scientists and an androïd (you) take part on a mission to uncover the secrets of the strange life forms inhabiting Occator Crater, on dwarf planet Ceres.

Soon, this mission will become a stage for each of the characters anxieties, and maybe (spoilers ahead), expose the deepest fears and unattainable hopes of an extinct spacefaring civilization.

•FEATURES
~ Alien worlds adventure.
~ Anxiety-ridden characters.
~ 2 very different endings, the second one coming in 3 different variations.
~ Original sound track (thanks Bosca Ceoil).
~ Hand-drawn visuals.

•ABOUT

Occator is a deeply imperfect narrative I started three months ago, to try out Ren'Py. I kind of lost control, wanting to make choices and multiple endings. It's not too bad I hope, but maybe this was too ambitious of a project to begin with. 

I think I'll make other Visual Novels, this is an interesting medium, and I'm deeply interested in interactions in narration.

This game might be buggy, please forgive me, I'm not a developper and even a simplified language such as Ren'Py's isn't comfortable to me. As this is not a major project to me, I'd prefer to leave it as it is and probably won't correct any bug or anything.

Yet it's been an interesting experience, and I hope you'll enjoy this game and forgive its narrative, visual, and dev mistakes.

English is not my birth language. There will probably be mistakes. I am sorry in advance.

/!\ CAUTION /!\
There are some flashing lights. If you are subject to epilepsy, maybe playing this game is not recommended.
